name: Celestial
description: You are a being of the celestial sphere, a being whose body and mind are shaped by an eternal law of motion. You possess the ability to cast divine spells. You are a celestial.

name: Demonic
description: You are a being of the demonic sphere, a being whose body and mind are shaped by an eternal law of motion. You possess the ability to cast demonic spells. You are a demon.

name: Elemental
description: You are a being of the elemental sphere, a being whose body and mind are shaped by an eternal law of motion. You possess the ability to cast elemental spells. You are an elemental.

name: Giant
description: You are a being of the giant sphere, a being whose body and mind are shaped by an eternal law of motion. You possess the ability to cast giant spells. You are a giant.

name: Humanoid
description: You are a being of the humanoid sphere, a being whose body and mind are shaped by an eternal law of motion. You possess the ability to cast humanoid spells. You are a humanoid.
